gao.core

Class GeoData

  • java.lang.Object
    • gao.core.GeoData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GeoData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for any geo-related information, including the spatial-index.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Martin Beyer
    See Also:
    IGeoObject, Serialized Form
